posts.body: What VPN provider will choose your Â£3 a month over going to court for not handing over logs? VPNs simply transfer your trust from ISP to VPN. They protect from dragnet and help you overcome geoblocks. Mullvad, Cryptostorm, Trust.Zone are okay.

Just got a banged up x230 for about $50 today. No charger and it was clearly dropped on a corner because the corner is chipped and the top of the screen comes apart if you make it. But I reckon replace screen, keyboard/palmrest, ssd, more ram, coreboot, lightweight linux distro and it'll be slick.
